name: Karnataka Post-Matric Scholarship
short_description: Scholarship for Karnataka students from economically weaker sections studying after SSLC.
full_description: Financial assistance for eligible students belonging to specified categories to continue post-matric education.
application_process:
1. Register on the state scholarship portal.
2. Fill online application with academic details.
3. Upload income and caste certificates.
4. Submit and track application status online.

name: Karnataka Farmer Equipment Subsidy
short_description: Subsidy on farm equipment for small and marginal farmers.
full_description: Provides subsidy on purchase of approved farm machinery and equipment to reduce input costs.
application_process:
1. Visit the Raitha Samparka Kendra or apply through the agriculture department portal.
2. Submit land records and ID proof.
3. Choose eligible equipment.
4. Await approval and subsidy disbursal.

name: Karnataka Women Entrepreneur Scheme
short_description: Financial support and training for women entrepreneurs in Karnataka.
full_description: Provides subsidized loans, training programs, and mentorship for women starting or expanding businesses in Karnataka.
application_process:
1. Apply through the Karnataka Udyog Mitra portal.
2. Submit business plan and financial projections.
3. Attend mandatory training sessions.
4. Receive loan approval and disbursement.
